title: Reprisal - Volume 4- She'll Get Your Engine Started
description: Trestle Press presents Sam Lang’s Reprisal, a digital short story series.Reprisal is a dying town built on secrets and haunted by a mysterious shadow since its beginnings.Eddie Newport must survive one night in this town with his oldest friend as a bus full of escaped murderers breaks down on Main Street. In She’ll Get Your Engine Started, the day of the prison transfer continues. Lonely David Lent thought he was going to get out. He thought he didn’t belong in prison. Things never went the way David thought. Living a life controlled by lies, David was happy being ignorant. Once he gets to Reprisal, he will know the truth.
author: Sam Lang
